name: ext-msg-kafka-c
description: Kafka driver using librdkafka; integrates with std.msg envelope and RR replay (pinned via arch/msg/kafka).
docs:
Kafka driver using librdkafka; integrates with std.msg.* envelope and RR replay (pinned via arch/msg/kafka).

Modules:
- std.msg.kafka
- std.msg.kafka.rr
- std.msg.kafka.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-msg-kafka-c@0.1.1
- Replay from RR cassettes in solve-rr with std.rr.with_policy_v1 + std.msg.kafka.rr.replay_driver_v1.
